languages.text: "Время, проведенное на Лилэтан, мы не потратили на пустое скорбление. Отнюдь — утерянные собратья откликнулись на мой зов и теперь молят о помощи. Ведомые местью, они направились по следам того, кто повиннен в печальной кончине Крудараха... И оказались пленниками одного из миров мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Время, проведенное на Лилэтан, мы не потратили на пустое скорбление. Отнюдь — утерянные собратья откликнулись на мой зов и теперь молят о помощи. Ведомые местью, они направились по следам того, кто повиннен в печальной кончине Крудараха... И оказались пленниками одного из миров мон-кай".
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."
languages.original_text: "Время, проведенное на Лилэтан, мы не потратили на пустое скорбление. Отнюдь — утерянные собратья откликнулись на мой зов и теперь молят о помощи. Ведомые местью, они направились по следам того, кто повиннен в печальной кончине Крудараха... И оказались пленниками одного из миров мон-кай".

Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: “在莉莱赞的这段时间里，我们并没有把时间浪费在无谓的悲痛之中。恰恰相反，我们迷失的族人已经响应了我的呼吁，现在正需要帮助。在复仇欲望的驱使之下，他们开始追捕那个导致克鲁达拉赫陨落的人，但却被困在了猴子的世界里，沦为了阶下囚。”
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: “在莉莱赞的这段时间里，我们并没有把时间浪费在无谓的悲痛之中。恰恰相反，我们迷失的族人已经响应了我的呼吁，现在正需要帮助。在复仇欲望的驱使之下，他们开始追捕那个导致克鲁达拉赫陨落的人，但却被困在了猴子的世界里，沦为了阶下囚。”
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Wir haben unsere Zeit auf der Lileath nicht in fruchtloser Trauer zugebracht. Im Gegenteil, unsere verlorenen Verwandten sind meinem Ruf gefolgt und flehen nun um Hilfe. Von Rache getrieben sind sie ausgezogen, den Drahtzieher hinter Crudarachs traurigem Niedergang zu jagen — nur um auf einer Chem-Pan-Sey-Welt in Gefangenschaft zu geraten."
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben unsere Zeit auf Lileath nicht in fruchtloser Trauer zugebracht. Im Gegenteil, unsere verlorenen Verwandten sind meinem Ruf gefolgt und flehen nun um Hilfe. Von Rache getrieben sind sie ausgezogen, den Drahtzieher hinter Crudarachs traurigem Niedergang zu jagen — nur um auf einer Chem-Pan-Sey-Welt in Gefangenschaft zu geraten."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: «El tiempo que estuvimos en el Lilaethan no se desperdició con llantos infructuosos. Antes al contrario, nuestros congéneres perdidos han respondido a mi llamada y ahora nos suplican que les ayudemos. Impulsados por la venganza, partieron en busca del responsable de la tragedia de Crudarach, solo para terminar siendo cautivos en un planeta mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: «El tiempo que estuvimos en el Lilaethan no se desperdició con llantos infructuosos. Antes al contrario, nuestros congéneres perdidos han respondido a mi llamada y ahora nos suplican que les ayudemos. Impulsados por la venganza, partieron en busca del responsable de la tragedia de Crudarach, solo para terminar siendo cautivos en un planeta mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: « Nous ne sommes pas venus dans la lilaethan pour pleurer sans but. Au contraire, nos semblables égarés ont répondu à mon appel et implorent désormais notre aide. Assoiffés de vengeance, ils sont partis à la poursuite de la personne à qui nous devons la terrible fin de Crudarach, mais cette chasse les a conduits à devenir captifs sur un monde mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne sommes pas venus dans la lilaethan pour pleurer sans but. Au contraire, nos semblables égarés ont répondu à mon appel et implorent désormais notre aide. Assoiffés de vengeance, ils sont partis à la poursuite de la personne à qui nous devons la terrible fin de Crudarach, mais cette chasse les a conduits à devenir captifs sur un monde mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: 「私たちはリラエタンで実りのない悲しみに明け暮れていたわけではない。それどころか、失われた同胞たちが私の呼びかけに応え、助けを求めている。復讐に駆られた彼らは、クルダラの無念の死を招いた張本人を追って旅立ったが、結局はモン＝ケイの惑星で捕虜となってしまった」
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはリラエタンで実りのない悲しみに明け暮れていたわけではない。それどころか、失われた同胞たちが私の呼びかけに応え、助けを求めている。復讐に駆られた彼らは、クルダラの無念の死を招いた張本人を追って旅立ったが、結局はモン＝ケイの惑星で捕虜となってしまった」
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: "Boş yere Lilaethan'ın yasını tutup geçmedik. Aksine çağrıma kulak veren kayıp soydaşlarım şimdi yardıma muhtaç. İntikam peşinde, Crudarach'ın elim kaybından sorumlu olanları bulma niyetiyle çıkıp gittiler, bir mon-keigh dünyasında esir düştüler."
languages.original_text: "We did not spend our time on the Lilaethan in fruitless grief. On the contrary, our lost kin have answered my call and are now pleading for help. Driven by revenge, they set out to pursue the one responsible for Crudarach's rueful demise, only to end up as captives on a mon-keigh world."

traits.locale_text: "Boş yere Lilaethan'ın yasını tutup geçmedik. Aksine, çağrıma kulak veren kayıp soydaşlarım şimdi yardıma muhtaç. İntikam peşinde, Crudarach'ın elim kaybından sorumlu olanları bulma niyetiyle çıkıp gittiler, bir mon-keigh dünyasında esir düştüler."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran
